channel.title: SYS49152
channel.description: Just a space to put whatever i feel like :)

item.title: Android headunits
item.description:
I’ve been contemplating putting an Android headunit in my car lately. It would solve the constant problem of GPS Navigation and have a decent music player.

This is a video about the Pumpkin C-0250, that is probably what i’m going to get:

As you can see, it can be updated with a custom ROM available at xda-developers, so it can be rooted quite easily.
